summary: Integrate with the Quick Base RESTful API to perform operations on resources like fields, files, records, and reports.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to perform operations on (e.g., field, file, record, report).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., get many fields, delete file, download file).

parameters.name: table id
parameters.description: The identifier of the table where the operation will be performed.

parameters.name: return all
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return (between 1 and 100).

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the operation, such as including field permissions.

parameters.name: record id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the record when performing operations on files.

parameters.name: field id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the field when performing operations on files.

parameters.name: version number
parameters.description: The version number required for certain file operations.
